title: 8-Bit Adventure Vol. 1 Music Pack
description: Original 8-Bit adventure music and sound fx for your retro/indie RPG adventure game.
longDescription:
15 original pieces (full track and loop-able versions) of 8-Bit electronic music and 50 sound effects. 


Preview/Demo


Tracks: 


1. Title Screen (2:00) 

2. Enemy Approaching (0:48) 

3. Hero's Theme (1:09) 

4. City (1:13) 

5. Fight! (2:20) 

6. Home (2:50) 

7. Shop Theme (0:51) 

8. Overworld (1:43) 

9. Abandoned Factory (1:22)

10. Race to the Finish! (1:03)

11. Boss Battle (1:22) 

12. Trophy Ceremony (0:33) 

13. King’s Castle (0:49) 

14. Ending Credits (1:30) 

15. Overworld Dance Remix (2:00) 


Sound FX: 


Coins, Jump Up, Fall, Sword Swipe, Blocked, Blocked 2, Elevator Lift 1, Elevator Lift 2, Elevator Lift 3, Open Door, Open Door 2, Explosion Explosion 2, Car Drive-By, Fire Sizzle, Water Wind & Waves, Down the Tunnel, Teleport, Teleport 2, Spring 1, Spring 2, Shiny Key, Rustling Trees & Bush, Treasure, Bubbly, Punch, Kick, Bird, Laser Gun, Rocket, Animal Cry, Animal Cry 2, POP!, Doorbell, Doorbell 2, New Item, Bed Time, Failure, Mission Complete, Text Bubble, Slow Walk, Fire Breather, Anvil, Heads Up!, STOP!, Squeaky, Enemy, Enemy Down, Big Boss
technicalDetails:
Features: 

  •  15 Full Tracks (original album track, and loop-able version) 
  •  50 sound fx (separated and in one long WAV file)


Number of Audio Wavs: 81

Number of Audio Cues: 81

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 bit, 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Loop-able versions included

Minutes of audio provided: 19 minutes 13 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Preview/Demo


All music and sound fx composed, recorded, and produced by Carlos Mata-Alvarez (ASCAP) 


Artwork by skydevilpalm
